indexLanguageText.title: Signature Generator: Create Impressive Signatures and Go
indexLanguageText.description: With our Signature Generator, quickly create personalized and professional digital signatures for all your documents. Effortless, efficient, and customizable to suit your style.
indexLanguageText.pDescription: With our Signature Generator, quickly create personalized and professional digital signatures for all your documents. Effortless, efficient, and customizable to suit your style.

indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: The Signature Generator is an online tool that uses artificial intelligence to create personalized digital signatures.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p2: It allows you to generate a professional and unique signature quickly, which can be used across a variety of digital documents like contracts, emails, and official forms.
indexQuestion.h2_2: How does the Signature Generator work?
indexQuestion.h2_2_p1: To use the AI Signature Generator, simply enter your name or desired text, and the tool will generate several digital signature options for you.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p2: You can choose the one you like, customize it, and then download it for use in any digital document.
indexQuestion.h2_3: Is the Signature Generator free to use?
indexQuestion.h2_3_p1: Yes, the AI Signature Generator is completely free. There are no hidden fees or subscription costs, allowing you to create and download as many digital signatures as needed.
indexQuestion.h2_4: Can I create multiple signature styles with the Signature Generator?
indexQuestion.h2_4_p1: Absolutely! The Signature Generator offers a wide range of signature styles, from professional signatures to handwritten ones. Whether you want a sleek, modern look or a more personal handwritten digital signature, you can easily customize it to your preference.
indexQuestion.h2_5: Can I create a custom signature using the Signature Generator?
indexQuestion.h2_5_p1: Yes, you can! In addition to pre-designed styles, the Signature Generator also allows you to hand-draw your own digital signature on the screen, giving you full control over how your signature appears.
indexQuestion.h2_6: Is my personal information secure when using the Signature Generator?
indexQuestion.h2_6_p1: Yes, your privacy is our priority. The AI Signature Generator ensures that all your personal information and digital signatures are securely stored and never shared with third parties, ensuring your data remains private.

handQuestion.h2_1: How do I create a unique signature?
handQuestion.h2_1_p1: Creating a unique signature is easy with the Handwritten Signature Generator. Simply select your preferred brush color and size, experiment with different styles on the screen, and customize until you find a design that perfectly reflects your personality.
handQuestion.h2_2: Can AI create a signature for me?
handQuestion.h2_2_p1: Yes! The AI Signature Generator uses intelligent tools to help you design a signature that is both professional and personalized. It offers customization options like brush color, size, and style, making it effortless to create your ideal signature.
handQuestion.h2_3: How do I customize my digital signature?
handQuestion.h2_3_p1: With the Handwritten Signature Generator you can easily customize your digital signature. Adjust the brush thickness, choose your favorite color, and preview the results in real-time to ensure your signature looks exactly the way you want it.
handQuestion.h2_4: What is the best style of signature?
handQuestion.h2_4_p1: The best signature style depends on your needs. For formal documents, a clean and simple style works best, while artistic or bold designs are ideal for creative uses. The Signature Generator provides a wide range of options for any purpose.
handQuestion.h2_5: Do signatures have to be in cursive?
handQuestion.h2_5_p1: No, signatures don’t have to be in cursive! Many people prefer print-style or abstract designs. The Handwritten Signature Generator supports both cursive and non-cursive styles, giving you the flexibility to choose the design you like.
handQuestion.h2_6: How do I create a digital signature?
handQuestion.h2_6_p1: Using the Handwritten Signature Generator, you can create a personalized digital signature in minutes. Select your preferred brush color and size, draw your signature on the screen, and download it for use in documents, emails, or any other application.

playInfos.h2_0: How to Use the Signature Generator
playInfos.h2_desc: Create your personalized signature with our Signature Generator in three simple steps
playInfos.h2_1_p1: Type in the name or text you want to generate a signature for.
playInfos.h2_2_p1: Select from a variety of handwritten or professional signature styles. As soon as you enter your name, the Signature Generator will instantly create your signature with zero delay.
playInfos.h2_3_p1: Once you’ve chosen your preferred version, simply download your signature and use it on any document, email, or form.

testimonialInfos.h2_1_p1: The Signature Generator has saved me so much time! As a business executive, I used to spend too long signing documents. Now, I can instantly create a professional signature and apply it within seconds. The customization options are great, and it looks just like my handwritten signature.
testimonialInfos.h2_2_p1: I’ve been using the AI Signature Generatorto sign my freelance contracts and emails. It’s super easy to use, and I love the variety of signature styles available. I can quickly personalize my signature without the hassle of scanning or printing.
testimonialInfos.h2_3_p1: As a student, I needed a simple way to sign my assignments and forms. The AI Signature Generator is perfect for this! I can draw my signature or use a pre-made style, and it’s completely free. It’s easy, fast, and looks professional.

handTestimonialInfos.h2_1_p1: As a freelance photographer, I wanted a signature that matches my creative flair. The Handwritten Signature Generator exceeded my expectations! The tool allowed me to choose the perfect brush color and size, and my signature now looks like it was handwritten, which is exactly what I wanted for my contracts and digital portfolios. The process was so simple, and I loved how quickly I could download the signature and start using it. If you’re a creative professional like me, this tool is a must!
handTestimonialInfos.h2_2_p1: Being an entrepreneur means signing a lot of important documents, and I needed a signature that looked professional and polished. The Handwritten Signature Generator was a lifesaver! I chose the right brush size and color, and in just a few minutes, I had a signature that looked just like I wrote it by hand. Now I use it on all my business contracts and emails. It’s not only time-saving but adds a nice personal touch to my professional documents. I highly recommend it to anyone in business.
handTestimonialInfos.h2_3_p1: As a high school teacher, I often have to sign paperwork and send emails to students and parents. I wanted a more personalized signature that was both professional and approachable. The Handwritten Signature Generator made it so easy! I selected a color I liked, adjusted the brush size to suit my style, and within minutes, I had a signature that felt just right. It’s now my go-to signature for everything, from report cards to email responses. This tool is a fantastic way to make digital signatures look authentic and personal!

featureInfos.h2_1_p1: With our Signature Generator, you can create personalized signatures instantly. Simply input your name, and the AI will generate multiple signature options for you to choose from, with no delay.
featureInfos.h2_2_p1: Choose from a variety of professional and handwritten signature styles, or create a completely custom signature by drawing it directly on the screen.
featureInfos.h2_3_p1: Our Signature Generator is completely free to use, and your signature data is kept private and secure, ensuring your personal information is always safe.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions

general.question: Is this extension free?
general.answer: Yes, we offer a free version for all users. We also provide a paid Pro version with additional advanced features.

general.question: How do I install the extension?
general.answer: You can download it directly from the Chrome Web Store or click the 'Download' button on our website.

features.question: How many tabs can I manage?
features.answer: Free version supports up to 50 tabs, while Pro version has no limit.

features.question: Does it support tab grouping?
features.answer: Yes, we support both custom grouping and smart grouping features.

technical.question: Which browsers are supported?
technical.answer: Currently supports Chrome, Edge and other Chromium-based browsers.

technical.question: Where is my data stored?
technical.answer: All data is stored locally on your device. We don't upload your browsing data.
